content: I'm trying to think why there are so few, and what it makes sense to focus on
There are few because the amazing devs that attended your writing sessions were very experienced. :-] It was fun to attend for me, because I learned so much from listening.
I was thinking about your comment, @Doc Jones, that you had learned more from these meetings
I had the thought of writing a meta vision doc story about the writing sessions :)
That would be interesting. I'm hoping to complete these projects I have teed up and take notes along the way to help craft a couple of Nicklaus level stories. It's going to take me a minute, though.
Yeah, I'm very excited about that project
Ideally we'd draft folks other than you, too
Maybe I can do a writing session just for niklaus's?
Yes, I just sent out a request in a group that might yield a nicklaus. It's tough to know what challenges I will experience until I try the tasks. Then I can share my pain. :]

nikomatsakis said:

Maybe I can do a writing session just for niklaus's?

Do you think this might be useful, @Doc Jones? Maybe scheduled for a week or two out :)
Maybe you could announce it on Twitter now and draw in more participants.
